NK008(nya)007:0: gnubs lugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyun khyer bzhugs /
NK008(nya)007:1: bla ma 'jam dpal rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK008(nya)007:2: bla ma mchog gsum 'jam dpal lhar //
NK008(nya)007:3: gus bas skyabs mchi mkha' mnyam 'gro //
NK008(nya)007:4: bla med byang chub mchog thob phyir //
NK008(nya)007:5: 'jam dpal dmar po bsgrub par bgyi //
NK008(nya)007:7: bdag nyid skad cig gis 'jam dpal gshin rje'i gshed du gsal bas /
NK008(nya)007:8: +amo b+h+au h'u b+h+au t+r+aam b+h+au h+r+aihb+h+au h+aa b+h+au /
NK008(nya)007:9: zhes brjod pas mtshon cha rnam pa lnga dang me yi gur khang gis phyogs kun khyab par gyur /
NK008(nya)007:10: rang rig snang stong dbyer med kyi rang bzhin yi ge h'u dmar por gsal ba las /
NK008(nya)007:12: dur khrod 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang chen po'i dbus su /
NK008(nya)007:13: ma he chu glang pad+ma nyi zla bsnol ba'i gdan la /
NK008(nya)007:14: +amo sh+r+ai many+dzu ma ru tse be ta li h'u phata /
NK008(nya)007:16: rang nyid skad cig gis 'jam dpal gshin rje'i gshed sku mdog dmar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
NK008(nya)007:17: phyag g.yas na me'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bsnams pa /
NK008(nya)007:18: g.yon pa rlung gi 'khor lo bskor ba /
NK008(nya)007:19: smin ma ag tshom las me stag gi tsh+wa tsh+wa 'phro ba /
NK008(nya)007:20: zhal bgrad cing mche ba gtsigs pa /
NK008(nya)007:21: mche ba g.yas nas rak+ta 'bab cing /
NK008(nya)007:22: g.yon pa'i 'od zer gyis dgra bgegs 'gugs pa /
NK008(nya)007:23: ral pa'i gseb nas khro chung spro ba /
NK008(nya)007:28: sbrul rigs lnga yi chun po /
NK008(nya)007:29: zhal nas h'u phata kyi sgra sgrog pa /
NK008(nya)007:30: zhabs gnyis brkyang bskums kyis me dpung dmar nag 'bar ba'i dbus na /
NK008(nya)007:31: yum e ka dz+aa ti dmar smug kha t+w+aam rtse
NK008(nya)007:32: gsum dang thod khrag stob pas 'khyud cing bde stong
NK008(nya)007:33: zung 'jug gi ngo bor bzhugs pa'o //
NK008(nya)007:36: de las 'od zer 'phros rang 'dra'i ye shes pa badz+ra sa m+aa dzah zhes snyan brnan /
NK008(nya)007:38: gru gsum dmar nag 'bar ba nas //
NK008(nya)007:39: 'jam dpal sku mchog dmar po che //
NK008(nya)007:41: gnas 'dir brtse phyir gshegs su gsol //
NK008(nya)007:42: e h+ye hi dzahmh'u ba hoh zhes spyan drangs shing bstim la /
NK008(nya)007:43: rmad du byung ba'i gtor ma dang //
NK008(nya)007:44: dam rdzas bdud rtsi'i mchod pa dang //
NK008(nya)007:45: sbyor sgrol rak+ta'i mchod pas mchod //
NK008(nya)007:46: thugs rjes dgongs la bzhes su gsol //
NK008(nya)007:47: sarba ma h+aa p+au dza kh+aa hi /
NK008(nya)007:49: gdug pa 'dul mdzad gshin rje'i gshed //
NK008(nya)007:50: yab gcig sku mchog dmar po la //
NK008(nya)007:51: dang ba'i yid kyis phyag tshal bstod //
NK008(nya)007:52: phrin las rnam bzhi sgrub par mdzod //
NK008(nya)007:54: snang grags 'gyu gsum lha sngags kyi rol par bltas la /
NK008(nya)007:55: many+dzu sh+r+ai ku m+aa ra ya ma r+aa dza h'u phata /
NK008(nya)007:62: dge ba 'di yis myur du bdag /
NK008(nya)007:64: 'gro ba gcig kyang ma lus pa //
NK008(nya)007:65: de yi sa la 'god bar shog /
